titles.title: A bill to clarify the effect of an amendment to Rule 35 of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 1/27/1987--Introduced. States that the April 29, 1985, order of the Supreme Court regarding rule 35(b) of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure (judicial review of a motion for reduction of sentence) shall continue in effect until a specified provision of the Comprehensive Crime Control Act of 1984 becomes effective (November 1, 1987).
